code: export function fetchFollowers(){return fetch("/api/followers").then(function(response){console.log(response);return response.json();});}export function addFollower(data){var url="/api/followers";var method="POST";return fetch(url,{method:method,body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}}).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function unFollow(id){var url="/api/followers/".concat(id);return fetch(url,{method:"DELETE"});}
